name: part_012
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】HOPE IS ON THE MOVE! #3DRyS [dR9q_J-8mfM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: IRyS continues her performance of 'Crazy for Love' while driving through a virtual city.
IRyS arrives at the EN Arena and transitions into an MC section, eventually getting a drink of 'Hope Soda'.
IRyS presents her 'HOPE Soda Can SleeveRyS' merchandise.
IRyS reflects on her journey to 3D and prepares the audience for the final song.

subtitles.original: Phew!
subtitles.english: Phew!

subtitles.original: How was that drive?
subtitles.english: How was that drive?

subtitles.original: I had a wonderful time with you guys, and we are here in one piece.
subtitles.english: I had a wonderful time with you guys, and we are here in one piece.

subtitles.original: One piece, no harm whatsoever...
subtitles.english: One piece, no harm whatsoever...

subtitles.original: ...we did not crash into anything.
subtitles.english: ...we did not crash into anything.

subtitles.original: Very safe, very fast drive.
subtitles.english: Very safe, very fast drive.

subtitles.original: And here we are at the EN Arena! Woo!
subtitles.english: And here we are at the EN Arena! Woo!

subtitles.original: That was great.
subtitles.english: That was great.

subtitles.original: And I sang so much, I'm getting a little tired.
subtitles.english: And I sang so much, I'm getting a little tired.

subtitles.original: I kind of think I need a drink.
subtitles.english: I kind of think I need a drink.

subtitles.original: Let me go get that drink.
subtitles.english: Let me go get that drink.

subtitles.original: Ey!
subtitles.english: Ey!

subtitles.original: And what else would I drink than this, the Hope Soda!
subtitles.english: And what else would I drink than this, the Hope Soda!

subtitles.original: Ah!
subtitles.english: Ah!

subtitles.original: Ah, that's good stuff.
subtitles.english: Ah, that's good stuff.

subtitles.original: Isn't it cute? I love the can, it's so cute.
subtitles.english: Isn't it cute? I love the can, it's so cute.

subtitles.original: Ah, this is like the best soda on earth.
subtitles.english: Ah, this is like the best soda on earth.

subtitles.original: And maybe a lot of you guys haven't tried it...
subtitles.english: And maybe a lot of you guys haven't tried it...

subtitles.original: ...maybe a lot of you guys don't have it.
subtitles.english: ...maybe a lot of you guys don't have it.

subtitles.original: It's okay...
subtitles.english: It's okay...

subtitles.original: ...because the merch today will be able to make up for it somewhat.
subtitles.english: ...because the merch today will be able to make up for it somewhat.

subtitles.original: Because even if you don't have your own Hope Soda...
subtitles.english: Because even if you don't have your own Hope Soda...

subtitles.original: Bam!
subtitles.english: Bam!

subtitles.original: HOPE Soda Can SleeveRyS (Can Sleeve)
subtitles.english: HOPE Soda Can SleeveRyS (Can Sleeve)

subtitles.original: Bam! You can use this Hope Soda can sleeveRyS...
subtitles.english: Bam! You can use this Hope Soda can sleeveRyS...

subtitles.original: ...to turn your run-of-the-mill old soda, whatever it is, into Hope Soda.
subtitles.english: ...to turn your run-of-the-mill old soda, whatever it is, into Hope Soda.

subtitles.original: At least feel like you're drinking Hope Soda. Let's go! Isn't it cute?
subtitles.english: At least feel like you're drinking Hope Soda. Let's go! Isn't it cute?

subtitles.original: The nice refreshing red-pink and the cool black strap. Yes!
subtitles.english: The nice refreshing red-pink and the cool black strap. Yes!

subtitles.original: And it's getting very hot, so I think it's a nice time to, you know...
subtitles.english: And it's getting very hot, so I think it's a nice time to, you know...

subtitles.original: ...have a nice cold drink, yes.
subtitles.english: ...have a nice cold drink, yes.

subtitles.original: Keep your drink chilled...
subtitles.english: Keep your drink chilled...

subtitles.original: ...and your hands drip-free. Yay!
subtitles.english: And your hands drip-free. Yay!

subtitles.original: So, buy-RyS the sleeve-RyS!
subtitles.english: So, buy-RyS the sleeve-RyS!

subtitles.original: Don't... not "bye-RyS", I mean B-U-Y-RyS.
subtitles.english: Don't... not "bye-RyS", I mean B-U-Y-RyS.

subtitles.original: Buy-RyS the sleeve, let's go!
subtitles.english: Buy-RyS the sleeve, let's go!

subtitles.original: Alrighty then.
subtitles.english: Alrighty then.

subtitles.original: It's really been reaching towards the very, very end.
subtitles.english: It's really been reaching towards the very, very end.

subtitles.original: It was a long journey, it's been what, two years?
subtitles.english: It was a long journey, it's been what, two years?

subtitles.original: Over two years since debut, and we're finally here with my 3D showcase.
subtitles.english: Over two years since debut, and we're finally here with my 3D showcase.

subtitles.original: I really wanted to do this.
subtitles.english: I really wanted to do this.

subtitles.original: Becoming 3D was one of my big reasons for wanting to join Hololive.
subtitles.english: Becoming 3D was one of my big reasons for wanting to join Hololive.

subtitles.original: And actually being able to stand here doing this 3D...
subtitles.english: And actually being able to stand here doing this 3D...

subtitles.original: ...it's all thanks to you guys and your support. Thank you so, so much.
subtitles.english: ...it's all thanks to you guys and your support. Thank you so, so much.

subtitles.original: And yes, it's been a long two years and we're here...
subtitles.english: And yes, it's been a long two years and we're here...

subtitles.original: ...but it's the start of a new page.
subtitles.english: ...but it's the start of a new page.

subtitles.original: And here's to many more years to come. Yay!
subtitles.english: And here's to many more years to come. Yay!

subtitles.original: Alrighty then.
subtitles.english: Alrighty then.

subtitles.original: Well, I think it's time for the final song.
subtitles.english: Well, I think it's time for the final song.

subtitles.original: 最後の1曲になるのかな？
subtitles.english: I wonder if it'll be the last song?

subtitles.original: 怪しいね、さ、さ、最後の1曲になるかな、どうだろう？
subtitles.english: Suspicious, isn't it? I wonder if it will be the final song, who knows?

subtitles.original: Well, who knows, maybe you guys might want an encore, I don't know...
subtitles.english: Well, who knows, maybe you guys might want an encore, I don't know...

subtitles.original: ...or maybe you guys want me to just hurry up and get out.
subtitles.english: ...or maybe you guys want me to just hurry up and get out.
